tech_news.title: Apple introduces new AirTag with expanded range and improved findability - Apple
tech_news.description: Apple today unveiled the new AirTag, now with an expanded finding range and a louder speaker.

tech_news.title: Forza Horizon 6 confirms the return of a dreaded game mode - TrueAchievements
tech_news.description: Developer Playground Games has confirmed that The Eliminator will be returning to Forza Horizon 6, a game mode that players either love or outright loathe.

tech_news.title: Final Fantasy 7 Remake Part 3 has a title now - Eurogamer
tech_news.description: Final Fantasy 7 Remake trilogy director Naoki Hamaguchi has confirmed Part 3 now has a title and is being made with Unreal Engine 4.

tech_news.title: Starfield 2.0 Could Be Real After All - Insider Gaming
tech_news.description: A new mention about Starfield 2.0 has surfaced, however, no concrete information has been shared. Here are more details.

tech_news.title: 'FTL in a Warhammer 40,000 Skin' Game Pulled From Steam After What May Be a Nuisance DMCA Takedown From a Troll Claiming to Be Games Workshop - IGN
tech_news.description: A strategy game dubbed ‘FTL in a Warhammer 40,000 skin’ was recently pulled from Steam, with its developer suggesting it may have been on the receiving end of a nuisance DMCA takedown from a troll claiming to be Games Workshop.

tech_news.title: Microsoft’s first Windows 11 update of 2026 has been a mess - The Verge
tech_news.description: Microsoft has had two issue two out-of-band patches for its first Windows 11 update of 2026. The security update has caused shutdown issues and Dropbox crashes.

tech_news.title: Former astronaut on lunar spacesuits: “I don’t think they’re great right now” - Ars Technica
tech_news.description: These are just the difficulties of designing a spacesuit for the lunar environment."

tech_news.title: CISA says critical VMware RCE flaw now actively exploited - BleepingComputer
tech_news.description: CISA has flagged a critical VMware vCenter Server vulnerability as actively exploited and ordered U.S. federal agencies to secure their servers within three weeks.

tech_news.title: Google could bring a taste of Apple’s Liquid Glass to Android 17 - Android Authority
tech_news.description: Android 17 might ditch flat design for Apple-style blur, bringing a more polished, lightweight feel to menus and controls.

tech_news.title: UK Charts: Final Fantasy VII Remake Intergrade Knocks Animal Crossing Down A Peg - Nintendo Life
